title: Canada's changing attitudes towards immigrants and Justin Trudeau's policy
description: Canada, once known to value newcomers, recently announced a sharp cut in the number of immigrants it allows into the country in an effort to "pause population growth". This marked a notable shift in policy for the Justin Trudeau government. In one of the "most stringent immigration cutbacks yet", Tr...
